## Prerequisites

```{r setup}
library(rgeogendiv)
```




## BOLD dataset

**BOLD** (Barcode Of Life Database) is a database of Barcode DNA sequences of georeferenced specimen that closely approximate species.

We use the package `bold` to download a set of georeferenced sequences for the *Pomacanthidae* taxon order.

```{r}
library(bold)
taxonRequest <- "Pomacanthidae"
resBold <- bold_seqspec(taxon=taxonRequest, sepfasta=TRUE)
```
